title: Dan Wootton MailOnline column paused amid investigation, publisher confirms
description: A DMG Media statement confirms the column's absence as it considers "serious" but "complex" allegations.

title: Donald Trump pleads not guilty to election charges in latest arraignment
description: The former president says his latest indictment amounts to "persecution of a political opponent".

title: UCI Cycling World Championships 2023: GB begin with two gold and two bronze medals
description: Great Britain's William Tidball wins gold in the men's scratch race at the Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.

title: Cycling World Championships 2023: Great Britain's William Tidball wins scratch race gold
description: Great Britain's William Tidball wins gold in the men's scratch race after timing his finish to perfection in a dramatic final lap at the Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.

title: The Hundred 2023: Ben Duckett's six and Georgia Wareham's stunning catch - plays of the day
description: Watch the best moments from day three of The Hundred 2023, including a ramp six from Birmingham Phoenix's Ben Duckett and a stunning catch by Northern Superchargers bowler Georgia Wareham.

title: England World Cup squad: Steve Borthwick set to take Marcus Smith to France
description: England head coach Steve Borthwick says his final 33-man squad for the World Cup is "pretty clear" with only "one or two places" to be finalised.

title: 'This is messed up': Las Vegas sphere displays massive eyeball
description: The venue displays different sphere-shaped images, but the blinking eye has stood out.

title: Sarah Ferguson: Duchess of York names reconstructed breast 'Derek'
description: The duchess reveals the nickname as her positive response to having a single mastectomy to treat cancer.

title: Fourteen hives, thousands of bees stolen near Llangollen
description: The culprits are likely to have some knowledge about beekeeping and to have stolen them at night.

title: Razzlekhan and husband guilty of $4.5bn Bitcoin launder
description: Heather Morgan and husband Ilya Lichtenstein plead guilty to money laundering and defrauding the US.

title: Two jailed for mistaken identity murder of aspiring lawyer
description: Two drug dealers have each been jailed for life with a minimum term of 27 years over the attack.

title: Harry Blake: Paedophile jailed on terror and indecent image charges
description: Harry Blake had been spared a prison sentence in 2020 after admitting several terror offences.

title: Bud Light boycott over trans influencer Dylan Mulvaney hits beer giant's sales
description: But performance by parent company AB/Inbev holds up better than expected.

title: Kidnapped woman in Oregon escaped makeshift cell, says FBI
description: The FBI fear there are other victims after they say a woman was held in a concrete block cell in Oregon.

title: Niger coup: Thousands march to support junta
description: Protesters condemn retaliatory sanctions and the threat of military force by West African leaders.

title: The Hundred 2023: Alice Davidson-Richards powers Northern Superchargers to win over Birmingham Phoenix
description: Alice Davidson-Richards stars with the ball as Northern Superchargers beat Birmingham Phoenix by seven wickets at Headingley.

title: Officer calls parents on Florida teen driving 132mph (212km/h)
description: The teen was going double the posted speed limit and the officer dialled up his father right away.

title: Robert Sanchez: Chelsea agree deal to sign Brighton goalkeeper for £25m
description: Chelsea agree a deal to sign Brighton goalkeeper Robert Sanchez for £25m plus add-ons.

title: Moises Caicedo: Brighton do not expect to sell midfielder this summer

title: Amazon rainforest: Deforestation in Brazil at six-year low
description: Data shows a 66% drop in deforestation rates in July 2023 compared to the same month last year.

title: Newcastle agree to sign Livramento for £40m

title: Alexandra Popp: 'I can't comprehend' Germany's World Cup exit

description: Northern Superchargers bowler Georgia Wareham takes a stunning catch to remove Birmingham Phoenix batter Erin Burns at Headingley in The Hundred.

title: Watch: CCTV shows John Lewis shoplifter loading speaker in bag

title: Lake District village painstakingly created in miniature

title: I stayed quiet on homophobia but that ends today - Ramsdale
description: Arsenal goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale says he wants football to be "welcoming for everyone", allowing his brother, who is gay, to attend matches without fear of abuse.

title: Red Admiral butterflies: Climate change sees migratory species stay in UK, says charity
description: Conservation charity says climate change means migratory species is increasingly staying in the UK.

title: 'Heartstopper helped me open up on sexuality in later life'
